item.title: An Automated Blood Cell Detection and Segmentation System
MatConvNet modules for 2-D RNNs (LSTM, GRU)
item.description:
Checkout the code on Github

Implementation of various 2-D RNN modules is included:

  • 2-D RNN
  • 2-D LSTM
    • Vanilla
    • With “peephole connections“
    • With coupled forget and input gates
  • 2-D GRU

item.title: Sparse Representation of Symmetric Positive Definite Matrices with Application in Texture Classification
item.description:
Encoding image information as Symmetric Positive Definite (SPD) matrices has become a popular method in computer vision and image analysis. However, it has been two challenges to analyze and process data of this type since (1) SPD matrices lie in a convex cone; (2) SPD matrices do not obey Euclidean geometry, but rather lie on the manifold with a Riemannian metric. This paper tackles the problem of sparse coding and dictionary learning in the space of SPD matrices. To this end, we proposed two kinds of strategies for solving the above problems: (1) to constrain atoms of dictionary to the SPD convex cone. (2) to transform all SPD matrices to a linear space followed by standard (kernel) sparse coding. We tested our proposed methods in texture classification and out-performed one of the state-of-the-art methods in terms of classification accuracy.

[View our technical report]
